data.name: contactUsP1
data.value: If you have any questions or concerns about our Privacy Policy or the use of your personal information, please contact us through the following means:

data.name: contactUsTitle
data.value: Contact Us

data.name: dataGetP1
data.value: We will retain your personal information only for as long as necessary for the purposes described in this policy or as required by law. After that period, your information will be deleted from our systems.

data.name: dataGetTitle
data.value: Retention of Personal Information

data.name: dataSafeP1
data.value: We implement appropriate security measures to protect the personal information you provide against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. The provided personal information is stored on secure servers and kept confidential.

data.name: dataSafeTitle
data.value: Protection of Personal Information

data.name: dataSharedP1
data.value: We will not share your personal information with third parties unless required by law or to provide services related to the application. In such cases, we ensure that the companies or individuals we share your information with maintain appropriate confidentiality and security.

data.name: dataSharedTitle
data.value: Sharing of Personal Information

data.name: FirstText
data.value: This Privacy Policy describes how we, Bomdev, collect, use, and protect the personal information you provide on our website. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. Please read this policy carefully before providing any personal information on our website.

data.name: PageTitle
data.value: Privacy Policy

data.name: personalDataP1
data.value: We may collect the following personal information provided by you:

data.name: personalDataP2
data.value: Name: We collect your name for identification and personalization purposes within our application.

data.name: personalDataP3
data.value: Email: We collect your email address to send relevant information about the application, such as updates, notifications, and important communications.

data.name: personalDataP4
data.value: Phone Number: The phone number is requested to contact you when necessary or for authentication purposes.

data.name: personalDataP5
data.value: Password: Your password is encrypted and securely stored. It is required to access your account and ensure the protection of your personal data.

data.name: personalDataTitle
data.value: Collection of Personal Information

data.name: personalDataUsesP1
data.value: The personal information we collect is used exclusively for the following purposes:

data.name: personalDataUsesP2
data.value: Display within the application: Your name and other personal information may be displayed within the application for personalization and improved user experience.

data.name: personalDataUsesP3
data.value: Communications: We will use your email address to send relevant information about the application, such as updates, notifications, and important communications.

data.name: personalDataUsesP4
data.value: Contact: We may contact you through the provided phone number in case of need or for authentication purposes.

data.name: personalDataUsesTitle
data.value: Use of Personal Information

data.name: privacyChangesP1
data.value: We reserve the right to update or modify this Privacy Policy at any time, and such changes will take effect immediately upon posting the revised version on our website. It is your responsibility to periodically review this policy to be aware of any changes.

data.name: privacyChangesTitle
data.value: Changes to this Privacy Policy

data.name: rightsP1
data.value: You have the right to access, correct, update, or delete your personal information at any time. If you wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us through the provided channels below.

data.name: rightsTitle
data.value: Your Rights

data.name: SumaryTitle
data.value: Topics
